snippet.title: TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES OUT OF THE SHADOWS Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 FULL GAME No Commentary
snippet.description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Out Of The Shadows Walkthrough Part 1 and until the last part will include the full Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Out Of The Shadows Gameplay on PS3. This Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Out Of The Shadows Gameplay is recorded in 1080p HD 60FPS on PS3 and will include the full game, all endings and all boss fights.

Enjoy!

If you liked the video please remember to leave a Like & Comment, I appreciate it a lot!

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Out of the Shadows takes you back to how it all began. Be the four Turtles Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael in the fight to save New York City from mutants, the Foot and Shredder. With seamless drop-in, drop-out co-op, along with team combo moves and relentless combat, this is the game fans have been waiting for.  Switch between Leonardo, Michelangelo, Raphael and Donatello to fight the corruption and destruction caused by Shredder’s Foot Clan. Synchronise your attacks for special combos and maximum turtle power.
Play with up to three friends in four-player TMNT co-op mode.

Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/MKIceAndFireMK
SUBSCRIBE - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1bwliGvJogr7cWK0nT2Eag?sub_confirmation=1
Support MKIceAndFire and become a member - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1bwliGvJogr7cWK0nT2Eag/join

Subscribe to MKIceAndFire to get all the new gameplay videos and walkthroughs of the latest games!

#TeenageMutantNinjaTurtles #Gameplay #Walkthrough
